Theme Development Bootstrap Based Theme for Applications

Extended Background Colors

Add a -light/-dark postfix to default bootstrap colors.

.bg-primary-dark

.bg-primary

.bg-primary-light

.bg-secondary-dark

.bg-secondary

.bg-secondary-light

.bg-success-dark

.bg-success

.bg-success-light

.bg-info-dark

.bg-info

.bg-info-light

.bg-warning-dark

.bg-warning

.bg-warning-light

.bg-danger-dark

.bg-danger

.bg-danger-light

.bg-light-dark

.bg-light

.bg-light-light

.bg-dark-dark
